description: Colonia Jaime is a unique community in Santiago del Estero, Argentina, founded in 1932, where around 100 residents live by philosophical principles emphasizing coexistence, education, and sustainable practices. This emblematic colony has been studied for its innovative agricultural methods and social technologies, such as biodigesters and drip irrigation. With a focus on community involvement and training, Colonia Jaime serves as a model for sustainable living, blending traditional values with modern advancements.
name: Colonia Jaime
